graphicalExtremes 0.1.0.9000

Generate random Hüsler--Reiss Models

Source: R/generate_examples.R
generate_random_model.Rd

Generates a random connected graph and Gamma matrix with conditional independence structure corresponding to that graph.

generate_random_model(d, graph_type = "tree", ...)

Arguments

d

Number of vertices in the graph
graph_type

"tree", "block", "decomposable", or "general"
...

Further arguments passed to functions generating the graph and Gamma matrix

See also

Other Example generations: generate_random_chordal_graph(), generate_random_connected_graph(), generate_random_graphical_Gamma(), generate_random_integer_Gamma(), generate_random_spd_matrix(), generate_random_tree()

Examples

set.seed(1)
d <- 12

generate_random_model(d, 'tree')

#> $graph
#> IGRAPH f0b0edf U--- 12 11 -- 
#> + edges from f0b0edf:
#>  [1] 1-- 7 1--12 2-- 3 3-- 8 3-- 9 4-- 5 4-- 6 6--10 7--10 7--11 9--10
